data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 26,076 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Friesland.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Friesland, Netherlands

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Friesland that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Friesland, Netherlands.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Friesland a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Moroccan, Arabic-speaking people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, encourage the 26,076 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 26,076 believers in Friesland to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 623,724 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.section_summary:
the state of Friesland, Netherlands has a population of 649,800.

We estimate Friesland has 26,076 people who might know Jesus, 278,472 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 345,252 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 24 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Friesland an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.
